title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.2 - Back-up warning devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.2 - Back-up warning devices

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the provisions of subdivision 26 of section
375
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, the use of a device attached to a vehicle for the
purpose of providing an audible warning when the vehicle is backing shall be
permitted, even though the audible warning may consist of a gong or a bell
sound. Any such device shall only be permitted to be sounded while the vehicle
is backing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
56.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
